org.libav.net

Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.libav.net.Server

  • public class Server
extends Object
    Universal ServerSocket listener.
    Author:
    Ondrej Perutka

      Server(IConnectionHandlerFactory connectionHandlerFactory)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void shutdown()
      Stop listening, close the underlaying server socket and interrupt all client request handlers.
      void startListening(ServerSocket ss)
      Start listening on the given server socket and use the default thread pool size (number of threads to server client requests).
      void startListening(ServerSocket ss, int threadPoolSize)
      Start listening on the given server socket and use the given thread pool size (number of threads to server client requests).
      void stopListening()
      Stop listening and close the underlaying server socket.

    • Method Detail

      • startListening

        public void startListening(ServerSocket ss)
        Start listening on the given server socket and use the default thread pool size (number of threads to server client requests).
        Parameters:
        ss - a server socket

      • startListening

        public void startListening(ServerSocket ss,
                  int threadPoolSize)
        Start listening on the given server socket and use the given thread pool size (number of threads to server client requests).
        Parameters:
        ss - a server socket
        threadPoolSize - a number of threads to server client requests

      • stopListening

        public void stopListening()
                   throws IOException
        Stop listening and close the underlaying server socket.
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs when closing underlaying server socket

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown()
              throws IOException
        Stop listening, close the underlaying server socket and interrupt all client request handlers.
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs when closing underlaying server socket
